Name: Avocado Pesto Bruschetta
Description: Sliced and toasted sourdough topped with a spread of creamy avocado pesto, cherry tomatoes, and basil.

Name: Zucchini Fritters
Description: Golden brown zucchini fritters, seasoned with garlic and herbs. Served with tzatziki sauce.

Name: Spicy Lentil Soup
Description: A hearty soup made from red lentils, carrots, and a touch of spice. Comes with a slice of whole-grain bread.

Name: Shrimp Tacos
Description: Soft corn tortillas filled with grilled shrimp, coleslaw, and mango salsa. Served with lime wedges.

Name: Stuffed Bell Peppers
Description: Bell peppers stuffed with a mixture of quinoa, black beans, corn, and melted cheese. Topped with avocado slices.

Name: Falafel Salad
Description: Crispy falafel served over a bed of arugula and mixed greens, with cherry tomatoes, cucumber, and tahini dressing.

Name: Seasonal Fruit Salad
Description: A refreshing blend of seasonal fruits topped with a light honey and mint dressing.

Name: Grilled Chicken Caesar
Description: Romaine lettuce tossed in Caesar dressing, croutons, and grilled chicken. Topped with Parmesan.

Name: Asian Noodle Bowl
Description: Glass noodles served with your choice of tofu or shrimp, fresh veggies, and a tangy tamarind sauce.

Name: Veggie Stacked Burger
Description: A vegetable patty stacked with lettuce, tomato, saut√©ed mushrooms, and vegan cheese. Served with sweet potato fries.

Name: Ricotta Spinach Cannelloni
Description: Cannelloni filled with a mixture of ricotta and spinach, baked in a tomato sauce and topped with mozzarella.

Name: BBQ Chicken Flatbread
Description: A thin crust flatbread topped with BBQ chicken, red onions, cilantro, and a three-cheese blend.

Name: Pumpkin Hummus Platter
Description: A seasonal twist on hummus featuring pumpkin. Served with an assortment of vegetables and pita.

Name: Berry Medley Parfait
Description: Layers of fresh mixed berries, Greek yogurt, and granola. A light and healthy dessert option.

Name: Banana Nut Bread Pudding
Description: Warm banana nut bread pudding topped with a scoop of vanilla ice cream and caramel sauce.

Name: Mini Fruit Tarts
Description: A selection of mini tarts filled with lemon curd, chocolate ganache, and raspberry jam.

Name: Strawberry Rhubarb Pie
Description: A perfect balance of sweet and tart, our strawberry rhubarb pie is a seasonal favorite.

Name: Chai Iced Latte
Description: Our Chai Latte served over ice. Perfectly spiced and refreshing.

Name: Lemon Ginger Cooler
Description: A blend of lemon juice, ginger, and sparkling water. A rejuvenating choice.

Name: Rosemary Peach Fizz
Description: Peach puree, rosemary-infused simple syrup, and soda make for a uniquely flavorful, non-alcoholic beverage.
